attributes.action: Raise sick pay to minimum wage
attributes.additional_details: Discus and see if the payments can be increased and make it a “good employer scheme” to pay minimum wage at least to all employees not just staff
attributes.background: Raise the amount paid when on sick to at least the minimum wage, employees should at least get minimum wage whilst if sick with employers asked to sign up to a scheme to pay employees fairly

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We understand you're concerned to equalise the pay employees receive when they are off work sick with at least the national minimum wage, but we're not sure if you'd like it to be mandatory or just encouraged via a Government scheme. 

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase Statutory Sick Pay to £330 per week during COVID-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569262

Increase Statutory Sick Pay (SSP)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559857

You could also start a new petition calling for Statutory Sick Pay to be made equivalent to an employee's contractual hours at least at minimum wage, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
